body_html: OK I've replicated the problem on a fresh AWS P2 instance using their CUDA 9 AMI with latest Pytorch conda install. If you provide your public key, I can give you access to try it out directly. My email is the first letter of my first name at fast.ai

body: OK I've replicated the problem on a fresh AWS P2 instance using their CUDA 9 AMI with latest Pytorch conda install. If you provide your public key, I can give you access to try it out directly. My email is the first letter of my first name at fast.ai
